meanings.sent1: The big dog was tougher than the small cat.
meanings.sent2: The oak tree is tougher than the pine tree.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's suit was tougher than steel!
meanings.sent4: Her resolve was tougher than diamond.
meanings.sent5: The old knight's armor was tougher than any foe.

meanings.sent1: The math problem was tougher than the one yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Running a marathon is tougher than a 5k race.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle while riding a unicycle is tougher than it looks!
meanings.sent4: Finding a needle in a haystack is tougher than winning the lottery.
meanings.sent5: Getting to the top of the mountain was tougher than they expected.

meanings.sent1: The teacher was tougher on the students during the final exam.
meanings.sent2: The judge was tougher on repeat offenders.
meanings.sent3: The referee was tougher than a drill sergeant!
meanings.sent4: The new law was tougher than the previous one.
meanings.sent5: The coach's training regimen was tougher than ever before.
